/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Trees and power lines add a touch of nature and modernity to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
